content.title: A Hellish Place
content.body:
The Nether Realm is a dark, hellish place; with a flaming floor, fiery foes, scorched remains, and many unknown things yet to be discovered.
This place has long been the subject of many legends: great tales of heroes, epic journeys, and nigh-unkillable foes. It can become the foundation of your legend, too; if you survive.
